name: 侯鵬曦
objective:
探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.
schedule:
9/16 專案管理概觀 Project Management Introduction
9/23 專案創意 Project Idea
9/30 專案分析 Project Analysis
10/7 專案規劃 Project Planning
10/14 專案表達 Project Presentation
10/21 專案排程 Project Schedule
10/28 時間管理 Time Control
11/4 專案成本 Project Cost
11/11 期中考 Midterm Exam
11/18 專案經理與團隊 Project Manager and Team
11/25 風險管理 Risk Management
12/2 專案溝通 Project Communication
12/9 專案監控與品質 Project Quality Control
12/16 小組報告 Team Report
12/23 專案分享 Case Study
12/30 專案實務 Project Practices
1/6 專案管理軟體 Project Management Software
1/13 期末考 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
專題演講、互動討論、案例分析、分組報告、實務分享
課堂表現（10%）、期中考試（30%）、分組報告（30%）、期末考試（30%）
Keynote Speech, Team Discussion, Case Study, Team Report, Practice Sharing
In-Class Performance (10%), Midterm Exam (30%), Team Report (30%), Final Exam (30%)
materials:
James P. Clements and Jack Gido. Effective Project Management, 4th ed. Canada : South-Western, 2009.
Project Management Institute. A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge, 3rd & 4th ed.
Samuel J. Mantel, Jr., Jack R. Meredith, Scott M. Shafer and Margaret M. Sutton. Project Management in Practice, 3rd ed. USA : John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2008.
